summary: It has been 25% since 2008. Before then it was 33%.

statements.quote: The 20% is non-negotiable. I wanted to do it at 15% -- this is for business -- I wented to do it at 15%; if you look at China, China is at 15%.
China has a business tax rate of 15%. We should do everything possible to match them in order to win with our economy. Jobs and wages!

name: China's corporate tax rate is 15%
